divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down 422 west after work in greenhills pa. left work at 0230est am was about to get off west reading exit when i looked up and saw a bluish white ball of light moving very fast was only in sky maybe 5 seconds did not have a tail so dont believe it was a comet. I was not looking up but it was so bright it caught my eye.And i lost it behind the mountain.Origanaly i thought maybe it was the sattelite coming down but heard that was still in orbit.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Reading
There was one other sighting in Reading on or around February 7th 2008
Summary: bright bluish white ball of light no tail
